function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through shared healthcare environments.","Impact":"Spread of diseases between healthcare professionals and patients, leading to increased infection rates and potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, regular cleaning, and use of personal protective equipment (PPE). Monitor and enforce social distancing measures in healthcare settings.","Technologies":"Use of UV-C disinfection systems, antimicrobial surfaces, and air purification systems. Implement telehealth and remote monitoring to minimize in-person interactions.","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, visitors, support staff.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management, government health organizations, infection control teams."}]}
